content.json:
## Sensitive Operations in Azure Activity Logs
---

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.description: Select Workspace where Azure Activity Logs are available

content.json: This Workbook utilizes Azure Activity Logs as a data source and it can be used to monitor sensitive operations from security aspects. Suspecious activities in Azure Resources can be detected by reviewing who performed it and from which IP.This workbook leverages detection methods provided in Azure Threat Research Matrix for Azure Activity Logs.
Please take time to answer a quick survey, [ click here. ](https://forms.microsoft.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=v4j5cvGGr0GRqy180BHbR6WFGSmpLgBFs8JcO3-8uANUOUpaWlNYWEIxTTI0VldWVk40V0VBOFVIWS4u)

content.title: Overall Activities
Selected Caller  Activities
content.noDataMessage: Please select caller from above overall activities table

content.title: Operations with earliest and latest occurance for the selected caller
content.noDataMessage: Please select caller from above overall activities table

content.title: Sentinel Analytic Rules Changes
NSG Rule Changes

content.query:
let opValues = dynamic(["Microsoft.SecurityInsights/dataConnectors/write", "Microsoft.SecurityInsights/dataConnectors/delete"]);
// Microsoft Sentinel Data Connectors Update / Delete
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue in~ (opValues)
| where ActivitySubstatusValue in ("Created", "OK")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, OperationNameValue, ActivityStatus, Caller, CallerIpAddress, ResourceId, ResourceGroup, SubscriptionId
content.title: Sentinel Data Connector Changes

content.query:
let opValues = dynamic(["Microsoft.Insights/ActivityLogAlerts/Delete", "Microsoft.Insights/ActivityLogAlerts/Write", "Microsoft.Insights/ActionGroups/Write", "Microsoft.Insights/ActionGroups/Delete"]);
// Log Alerts Update / Delete
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue in~ (opValues)
| where ActivitySubstatusValue in ("Created", "OK")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, OperationNameValue, ActivityStatus, Caller, CallerIpAddress, ResourceId, ResourceGroup, SubscriptionId

content.query:
let opValues = dynamic(["Microsoft.Authorization/locks/write", "Microsoft.Authorization/locks/delete"]);
// Azure Policy Update / Delete
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue in~ (opValues)

content.title: Azure Resource Locks Changes

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue == "Microsoft.Authorization/policies/deny/action"
| where ActivityStatusValue == "Failed"
| extend Policydetail = tolower(tostring(todynamic(Properties).['policies']))
| extend PolicyAssignmentName = tolower(tostring(todynamic(Policydetail)[0].['policyassignmentdisplayname']))
| extend PolicyDefinitionName = tolower(tostring(todynamic(Policydetail)[0].['policydefinitiondisplayname']))
| extend AssignementID = tolower(tostring(todynamic(Policydetail)[0].['policyassignmentid']))
| project TimeGenerated, Caller, ActivityStatusValue, ResourceGroup, ResourceProviderValue,  Resource,  _ResourceId, _SubscriptionId, PolicyAssignmentName, PolicyDefinitionName, AssignementID
content.title: Resource Deployment Denied by Azure Policy

items.name: Resource Deployment Denied by Azure Policy

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue == "Microsoft.Authorization/policies/deployIfNotExists/action"
| extend Pupdated = tolower(tostring(todynamic(Properties).['updatedResources']))
| where Pupdated != "[]" and Pupdated != ""
| extend Policydetail = tolower(tostring(todynamic(Properties).['policies']))
| extend PolicyName = tolower(tostring(todynamic(Policydetail)[0].['policyassignmentdisplayname']))
| extend PolicyDefinitionName = tolower(tostring(todynamic(Policydetail)[0].['policydefinitiondisplayname']))
| extend AssignementID = tolower(tostring(todynamic(Policydetail)[0].['policyassignmentid']))
| project Resource, ResourceGroup, _ResourceId, SubscriptionId, Caller, PolicyName, PolicyDefinitionName, AssignementID, UpdatedObject=Pupdated
content.title: Resource Deployment Performed by Azure Policy

items.name: Resource Deployment performed by Azure Policy

Sentinel Workbook Changes

content.query:
// VM extensions Create / Update 
AzureActivity
//| where Category == "Administrative"
| where OperationName =~ "Create or Update Virtual Machine Extension"
| where ActivitySubstatusValue in ("Created", "OK")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, OperationNameValue, ActivityStatus, Caller, CallerIpAddress, ResourceId, ResourceGroup, SubscriptionId

Compute Gallery Application Changes
VM Run Commands

content.query:
AzureActivity
| extend OperationNameValue
| where OperationNameValue =~ "MICROSOFT.RESOURCES/DEPLOYMENTS/VALIDATE/ACTION"
| where _ResourceId contains "VMAccessWindowsPasswordReset"
//| where ActivitySubstatusValue in ("Created", "OK")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, OperationNameValue, ActivityStatusValue, Caller, CallerIpAddress, _ResourceId, ResourceGroup, SubscriptionId

ManagedServicesResources
| where type== "microsoft.managedservices/registrationassignments"
content.title: List of Lighthouse Registration Assignments by Service Provider

items.name: List of Lighthouse Registration Assignments by Service Provider - Copy

content.query:
//Provide your Tenant Domain (example contoso.com)
let Hometenantdomain = dynamic(["TENANT_DOMAIN_VALUE"]);
AzureActivity
| where Caller !contains Hometenantdomain
| where ActivitySubstatusValue in ("Created", "OK")
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| where parse_json(Claims).idtyp <> "app"
| project     TimeGenerated,  OperationName,  OperationNameValue, ActivityStatus,  Caller,  CallerIpAddress, 
    ResourceId,     ResourceGroup,     SubscriptionId
content.title: Activities performed by Guest Users(Provide your Home Tenant Domain in the Query)

content.query:
let HomeTenantId = "Provide your Azure AD Tenant ID HERE";
//example HomeTenantId= "8756erxyz"
AzureActivity
| extend TenantId = todynamic(Claims).['http://schemas.microsoft.com/identity/claims/tenantid']
| where TenantId != HomeTenantId
| where isnotempty( TenantId )
| where ActivitySubstatusValue in ("Created", "OK")
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, OperationNameValue, ActivityStatus, TenantId , Caller, CallerIpAddress, ResourceId, ResourceGroup, SubscriptionId
content.title: Activities performed by external Lighthouse (CSP/MSP) Users (Provide your Home Tenant ID in the Query)

items.name: Activities performed by external CSP/MSP Users

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue has_any ("ipfilterrules", "securityRules", "publicIPAddresses", "firewallrules") and OperationNameValue endswith "write"
// Choosing Accepted here because it has the Rule Attributes included
| where ActivityStatusValue == "Accepted" 
// If there is publicIP info, include it
| extend publicIPAddress_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).ipAddress) 
| extend publicIPAddressVersion_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).publicIPAddressVersion) 
| extend publicIPAllocationMethod_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).publicIPAllocationMethod) 
// Include rule attributes for context
| extend access = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).access) 
| extend description = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).description) 
| extend destinationPortRange = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).destinationPortRange) 
| extend direction = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).direction) 
| extend protocol = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).protocol) 
| extend sourcePortRange = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).sourcePortRange) 
| summarize StartTime = min(TimeGenerated), EndTime = max(TimeGenerated), ResourceIds = makeset(ResourceId) by Caller, CallerIpAddress, Resource, ResourceGroup, 
ActivityStatusValue, ActivitySubstatus, SubscriptionId, access, description, destinationPortRange, direction, protocol, sourcePortRange  
| extend timestamp = StartTime, AccountCustomEntity = Caller, IPCustomEntity = CallerIpAddress
content.title: Network port changes

content.query:
let OperationNames = dynamic(["microsoft.compute/virtualMachines/write", "microsoft.resources/deployments/write"]);
AzureActivity
// We look for any Operation that modified and then was accepted or succeeded where a publicipaddress component is referenced
| where OperationNameValue in~ (OperationNames)
| where ActivityStatusValue has_any ("Succeeded", "Accepted")
| where Properties contains "publicipaddress"
//| extend frontendIPConfigurations = Properties.responseBody.properties.frontendIPConfigurations
// parsing the publicIPAddress from Properties. It is only available if the allocation method is Static.
| parse Properties with * "publicIPAddress\\" PublicIPAddressParse
| extend publicIPAddress_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).ipAddress) 
| extend publicIPAddressVersion_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).publicIPAddressVersion) 
| extend publicIPAllocationMethod_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).responseBody)).properties)).publicIPAllocationMethod) 
| extend scope_ = tostring(parse_json(Authorization).scope) 
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    OperationNameValue,
    publicIPAllocationMethod_,
    publicIPAddressVersion_,
    scope_,
    Caller,
    CallerIpAddress,
    ActivityStatusValue,
    Resource
content.title: VM Public IP Assignment Changes
